newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria offers three floater T-bill issues May 12.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria offers three floater T-bill issues May 12.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry will offer three floating interest T-bill issues with maturities of six, nine and 12 months at auctions on Monday, the central bank said.
The issues will be offered with no par values or minimum acceptable prices set in advance.
Interest on the issues is due at maturity. It equals the central bank main interest rate and is adjusted every time the rate changes.

Yields to maturity on lev-denominated six-, nine- and 12-month floater T-bill issues auctioned last Monday at a discount were 41.02, 64.27 and 84.78 percent, respectively under the current main interest rate of 6.20 percent monthly.
